item.title: About
item.description: Hi! This is my personal website, where I am not sure what I am going to do (blogs? research follow-alongs?). I am a third year undergraduate at IIT Kharagpur. My research interests lie in the fields of Deep Learning, Natural Language Processing, Image Processing, Reinforcement Learning and Usable Security and Privacy. My learning methodology in the above fields has always been engaging in meaningful projects and to pick up the required core concepts on-the-go.
